DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Asia . The aim trial investigate safety profile liraglutide normal condition use .
DOC.brief_title: Non-Interventional Study Safety Liraglutide Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Subjects type 2 diabetes mellitus , include newlydiagnosed subject already receive antidiabetic medication include GLP1 analogue Liraglutide , require treatment liraglutide accord clinical judgment treat physician Subjects capable give studyspecific sign informed consent collection information Subjects type 1 diabetes Subjects previously liraglutide Subjects participate another clinical trial Subjects hypersensitivity liraglutide excipients ( Disodium phosphate dihydrate , propylene glycol , phenol , water injection ) Subjects pregnant , breast feeding intention become pregnant within follow 6 month
